description: Dashboard to view metrics of elasticsearch_exporter on each elasticsearch servers

panels.description: Number of nodes in the cluster.
panels.title: Running Nodes

panels.description: Cluster level changes which have not yet been executed
panels.title: Pending Tasks

panels.description: JVM memory currently used by area
panels.title: JVM memory used

panels.description: Used size of block device in percent
panels.title: Disk usage

panels.description: Current size of stored index data in bytes
panels.title: Index data size per node

targets.expr:
sum(rate(elasticsearch_jvm_gc_collection_seconds_sum{cluster=~"$cluster", name=~"$node", gc="young"}[$__interval])) by (name) / sum(rate(elasticsearch_jvm_gc_collection_seconds_count{cluster=~"$cluster", name=~"$node", gc="young"}[$__interval])) by (name)
or
sum(irate(elasticsearch_jvm_gc_collection_seconds_sum{cluster=~"$cluster", name=~"$node", gc="young"}[5m])) by (name) / sum(irate(elasticsearch_jvm_gc_collection_seconds_count{cluster=~"$cluster", name=~"$node", gc="young"}[5m])) by (name)

sum(rate(elasticsearch_jvm_gc_collection_seconds_sum{cluster=~"$cluster", name=~"$node", gc="old"}[$__interval])) by (name) / sum(rate(elasticsearch_jvm_gc_collection_seconds_count{cluster=~"$cluster", name=~"$node", gc="old"}[$__interval])) by (name)
or
sum(irate(elasticsearch_jvm_gc_collection_seconds_sum{cluster=~"$cluster", name=~"$node", gc="old"}[5m])) by (name) / sum(irate(elasticsearch_jvm_gc_collection_seconds_count{cluster=~"$cluster", name=~"$node", gc="old"}[5m])) by (name)

panels.description: Average get time in seconds

targets.expr:
sum(rate(elasticsearch_indices_get_time_seconds{cluster="$cluster", name=~"$node"}[$__interval])) by (name) / sum(rate(elasticsearch_indices_get_total{cluster="$cluster", name=~"$node"}[$__interval])) by (name) 
or
sum(irate(elasticsearch_indices_get_time_seconds{cluster="$cluster", name=~"$node"}[5m])) by (name)  / sum(irate(elasticsearch_indices_get_total{cluster="$cluster", name=~"$node"}[5m])) by (name)

panels.title: Get Latencies

panels.description: Average merge size in bytes and time spent merging in seconds

targets.expr:
sum(rate(elasticsearch_indices_merges_total_time_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", name=~"$node"}[$__interval])) by (name) / sum(rate(elasticsearch_indices_merges_total{cluster="$cluster", name=~"$node"}[$__interval])) by (name)
or
sum(irate(elasticsearch_indices_merges_total_time_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", name=~"$node"}[5m])) by (name) / sum(irate(elasticsearch_indices_merges_total	{cluster="$cluster", name=~"$node"}[5m])) by (name)

sum(rate(elasticsearch_indices_merges_total_size_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", name=~"$node"}[$__interval])) by (name) / sum(rate(elasticsearch_indices_merges_total{cluster="$cluster", name=~"$node"}[$__interval])) by (name)
or
sum(irate(elasticsearch_indices_merges_total_size_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", name=~"$node"}[5m])) by (name) / sum(irate(elasticsearch_indices_merges_total	{cluster="$cluster", name=~"$node"}[5m])) by (name)

panels.title: Merges

panels.description: Average time spent refreshing in seconds

targets.expr:
sum(rate(elasticsearch_indices_refresh_time_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", name=~"$node"}[$__interval])) by (name) / sum(rate(elasticsearch_indices_refresh_total	{cluster="$cluster", name=~"$node"}[$__interval])) by (name)
or
sum(irate(elasticsearch_indices_refresh_time_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", name=~"$node"}[5m])) by (name) / sum(irate(elasticsearch_indices_refresh_total	{cluster="$cluster", name=~"$node"}[5m])) by (name)

panels.title: Refresh

targets.expr: sum(rate(elasticsearch_thread_pool_completed_count{cluster=~"$cluster", type!="management", name=~"$node"}[$__interval])) by (type) or sum(irate(elasticsearch_thread_pool_completed_count{cluster=~"$cluster", type!="management", name=~"$node"}[5m])) by (type)

title: Elasticsearch: details
